title: Typographic Meme Hangout
content:
Assuming I'm using "meme" correctly:  
Is there a place where people post their typographic memes? I mean like the stuff Dyana made here:  
 [http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/hipster-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702080635/http:/typographica.org/typeface-reviews/hipster-script/ "http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/hipster-script/")

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: Hrant, as you are tentatively expanding into the world of social media beyond this forum, perhaps you need to open a tumblr account? Wait, are you coming out about the [Ryan Gosling tumblr meme](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702080635/http:/typographerryangosling.tumblr.com/)? ;-)

Funny stuff, guys.  
Karl, Tumblr? I need more time to heal. ;-)

I think I'd seen that once, some time ago. Some good ones there!  
BTW who runs it? That avatar looks familiar.
